00018 #include <sys/time.h>
00019 
00020 static struct timeval tv0;
00021 
00022 inline void RestartTimer()
00023 {
00024   struct timezone tz;
00025   gettimeofday(&tv0,&tz);
00026 }
00027 
00028 inline float Timer()
00029 {
00030   struct timeval tv;
00031   struct timezone tz;
00032   gettimeofday(&tv,&tz);
00033   float msec = static_cast<int>(tv.tv_usec/1000)/1000.0;
00034   float msec0 = static_cast<int>(tv0.tv_usec/1000)/1000.0;
00035   float time = (tv.tv_sec+msec)-(tv0.tv_sec+msec0);
00036   return time;
00037 }
